title: Driver's miracle survival after giant boulder rolls off mountain and crushes car
text:

A driver has dramatically cheated death as a giant boulder rolled off a mountain and on to his car.

Dashcam footage from a car following the lucky driver, caught the moment the huge rock landed.

In the video, recorded on Sunday, the white saloon car can be seen travelling on the mountain road towards the city of Lushui, China.

The boulder rolls off the cliff landing on the roof of the white car, smashing in the metal before bouncing off and disappearing down the ravine to the left.

The saloon car is stopped in its tracks and left with a huge dent in its roof as the mangled metal is caved in on the back seat.

(Image: AsiaWire)

(Image: AsiaWire)

The driver, whom Chinese media report 'cheated death', survived in a narrow space at the front of the car.

He was later freed with the help of passersby.

(Image: AsiaWire)

(Image: AsiaWire)

It was unclear whether he required any treatment in hospital.

Footage taken in the aftermath of the freak accident shows the written-off saloon car almost shaped beyond recognition.

Social media users said the motorist was lucky his vehicle was not pushed off the road, as it may have rolled down the ravine and into the waters of the Nujiang River below.
description: Dashcam footage from a car following the lucky driver caught the moment the huge rock landed in Lushui, China
